definitions.text: the fluid (red in vertebrates) that is pumped through the body by the heart and contains plasma, blood cells, and platelets
examples: blood carries oxygen and nutrients to the tissues and carries away waste products
the ancients believed that blood was the seat of the emotions

definitions.text: a dissolute man in fashionable society

examples: his entire lineage has been warriors

definitions.text: people viewed as members of a group
examples: we need more young blood in this organization

definitions.text: smear with blood, as in a hunting initiation rite, where the face of a person is smeared with the blood of the kill
